title: Railways of Australia
creator_credit: William M. Carty, Frank Killian, Commonwealth Railways and Cinesound Movietone
brief_description: Surveys the railway system in Australia today, and the need for its maintenance and improvement to meet the ever-increasing calls for all forms of quick and efficient transportation. Stresses the importance of railways for carrying large numbers of people and raw materials.
creator_credit_for_label: William M. Carty, Frank Killian, Commonwealth Railways and Cinesound Movietone
